name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Solutions Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing innovative solutions using **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **Docker** technologies. My expertise includes designing and implementing **APIs** for Speech to Text (STT), Text to Speech (TTS), and Voice Assistant (VA) systems, supporting high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. I have a robust understanding of cloud services including **AWS** and **Azure**, and I utilize tools like **Kubernetes** and **Helm** for container orchestration. 

My strong foundation in problem-solving and communication skills enables me to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable software solutions. With a solid background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, I ensure robust, secure applications while adhering to Data Privacy regulations. I am also skilled in developing AI/ML capabilities, serving models in production, and utilizing MLOps workflows.
